about_the_game:
Bogdan's Cross is an action-adventure game set in the tumultuous era of the Crusades. Follow the journey of Bogdan, a humble shepherd boy, as he rises to become a legendary Templar knight. Traverse stunning landscapes, uncover hidden tales and mysteries, and confront shadows of doubt and despair. While grounded in historical accuracy, the game takes creative liberties to weave a captivating fictional narrative.

Key Features:

Immersive Storytelling:
Dive into a richly woven narrative that captures the essence of the medieval period. Follow Bogdan's transformation from a humble shepherd to a revered Templar knight. Experience his internal struggles and moments of faith, redemption, and transformation as you navigate through an epic story filled with unexpected twists and profound themes.



Historical Figures and Settings:
Bogdan's Cross brings history to life by incorporating real historical figures and meticulously recreated settings from the medieval era. Encounter legendary Templar knights, interact with notable figures from the Crusades, and explore medieval towns, castles, and battlefields. While the game takes creative liberties to enhance the story, the attention to historical detail ensures an authentic experience that immerses players in the past.



Exploration and Adventure:
Embark on a journey across diverse and beautifully rendered landscapes. From the rolling hills of the countryside to the bustling streets of medieval cities, each environment is meticulously crafted to provide a sense of wonder and discovery. Uncover hidden secrets, solve environmental puzzles, and find valuable treasures that enhance your abilities and deepen the story. The open-world design encourages exploration, allowing players to venture off the beaten path and uncover the rich history of the Templar Order.



Combat and Puzzle-Solving:
Engage in intense and visceral close-quarters combat that captures the brutality and skill of knightly battles. Face a wide range of enemies, including sinister dark entities and strange, otherworldly creatures that lurk in the shadows. Each encounter is a test of your combat prowess, requiring quick reflexes and precise timing. Use a variety of medieval weapons and armor to defend yourself and defeat your foes



Collectible Items:
Immerse yourself further into the world of Bogdan's Cross by discovering a range of collectible items. These include pages from the Latin Vulgate Bible, ancient relics, and other period-related artifacts. Each collectible not only adds depth to the historical context but also provides insights into the lore and hidden stories of the Templar Order. Collecting these items can unlock special abilities, offer narrative clues, and enhance your understanding of the game’s rich tapestry.



About the Developer

Creating Bogdan's Cross has been a deeply personal and transformative journey for me. Coming from the animation industry, where I honed my skills in storytelling and visual artistry, I decided to embark on the ambitious path of solo game development. This game represents my first foray into the world of video games, driven by a passion to blend historical authenticity with compelling fiction.

A key part of my development process involved using Quill, a VR art tool, to bring Bogdan's universe to life. This innovative workflow allowed me to craft detailed environments and characters in a highly immersive and intuitive way, ensuring a unique and visually stunning experience for players. Every element of Bogdan's Cross, from the detailed environments to the intricate character arcs, reflects my dedication to creating an immersive and engaging experience. I hope that players will find the same sense of wonder and excitement in playing the game as I did in making it.

  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8400 or AMD Phenom II x2 550
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 260 or Radeon HD 4850
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

short_description: Experience the journey of Bogdan, a shepherd turned legendary Templar knight, in Bogdan's Cross. Traverse stunning landscapes, battle fierce foes, and uncover the hidden tale that shapes the destiny of the Templar Order. Become the hero of your own legend in this action-packed adventure!
